radiographic_examinations.findings: Generalized atrophy; no evidence of hemorrhage.
Generalized brain atrophy and diffuse white-matter hyperintensity.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the head and chest

radiographic_examinations.findings: Generalized cerebral atrophy, more prominent in the left frontal lobe; dilatation of the left lateral ventricle; asymmetric hyperintensity in the occipitoparietal and posterior temporal white matter.
